name: Lazer Assassin
description:
Welcome to the future, where lasers are the new standards for weapons.

Say goodbye to ballistic weapons, as you play as a one-armed assassin (canonically) that wields a laser weapon and manages to use mirrors and other cool stuff to bounce shots off walls to assassinate a target.

Credits:

Sherwyn - https://bamboo01.itch.io/
